data.name: Rebirth by John Andrew Storey
data.description:
This is an audiobook of Bodhi Leaves No. 54 by John Andrew Storey, "Rebirth" narrated by Christa Michel. 

0:00 Pariyatti Introduction 
0:25 Rebirth: Introduction 
3:22 Ancient and Universal
6:06 The Natural Law
11:19 Memories from Former Lives
18:48 What Survives?
23:21 The Process Explained
26:29 Conclusion and Ackowledgments
27:55 Credits and About Pariyatti

user.name: Pariyatti
user.bio: Pariyatti exists to bring people into contact with the teachings of the Buddha. We provide resources in the Theravāda tradition, and support Pāli language students and Vipassana meditators, in the tradition of Sayagyi U Ba Khin as taught by S.N. Goenka. We serve meditators, scholars, educators and the public by providing ready access to hard-to-find titles, a large collection of online resources, pilgrimages, and Pāli workshops.
user.short_bio: Pariyatti enriches the world by disseminating the words of the Buddha, providing sustenance for the seekers journey, and illuminating the meditators path.

data.name: Treasures of the Noble by Soma Thera
data.description:
This is an audiobook of Bodhi Leaves No. 27 by Soma Thera, "Treasures of the Noble" narrated by Takae Ishizuka. 

Pariyatti Introduction 0:00
Treasures of the Noble 0:25
1-Confidence (saddhā) 3:08
2-Virtue (sīla) 7:33
3 and 4 – Shame and Fear (hiri-ottappa) 11:36
5-Learning (suta) 15:50
6-Bounty (cāga) 19:16
7-Right Understanding (sammā-diṭṭhi) 24:28
Credits and About Pariyatti 27:56

data.name: The Art of Living - Russian (ИСКУССТВО ЖИЗНИ)
data.description:
This is an audiobook of "The Art of Living" by William Hart translated to Russian, Narrated by Ksenia Bogdaniva (Ксения Богданова).

0:00 1. Предисловие:Preface	
16:32 2. Введение:Introduction	
32:20 3.0. Глава 1. Искания:Chapter 1 The Search	
1:08:13 3.1. Плавалогия:Story Swimology	
1:12:41 4. Глава 2. Исходная точка:Chapter 2 The Starting Point	
1:42:39 5. Глава 3, Непосредственная причина:Chapter 3 The Immeditate Cause
2:10:44 6. Глава 4.Корень проблемы: Chapter 4 The Root of the Problem 	
2:55:12 7. Глава 5.Нравственное поведение:Chapter 5 The Training of Moral Conduct 	
3:35:04 8. Глава 6.Развитие сосредоточения:Chapter 6 The Training of Concentration	
4:20:04 9. Глава 7. Развитие мудрости:Chapter 7 The Training of Wisdom
5:25:36 10. Глава 8. Осознанность и уравновешенность_Chapter 8 Awareness and Equanimity
6:07:33 11. Глава 9. Цель:Chapter 9 The Goal	
6:49:11 12. Глава 10. Искусство жизни:Chapter 10 The Art of Living
7:33:03 13. Приложения 1-2:Appentix A&B

data.description:

data.name: Letter from Māra by Ajahn Puṇṇadhammo
data.description:
This is a Pariyatti audiobook of "Letter from Māra" (Wheel Publication No. 461) by Ajahn Puṇṇadhammo.

0:00 Pariyatti Introduction	
0:25 Letter from Māra—Squadrons	
9:24 Māra to his Minions	
11:56 First Army—The Host of Sense-Desires	
20:36 Second Army—Boredom	
26:03 Third Army—Hunger and Thirst	
31:36 Fourth Army—Craving	
40:42 Fifth Army—Sloth and Accidie	
47:51 Sixth Army—Cowardice	
53:29 Seventh Army—Uncertainty	
1:00:45 Eighth Army—Malice and Obstinacy	
1:08:21 Ninth Army—Honour, Renown, and Notoriety	
1:13:18 Tenth Army—Self-Praise and Denigration of Others	
1:23:49 Credits and About Pariyatti

http://a-fwd.com/com=pariyatti-20&asin=1681725614

Más libros de los autores:
store.pariyatti.org/paul_fleischman

Consulta miles de recursos relacionados con la meditación Vipassana y las enseñanzas de Buda en nuestra tienda en línea: store.pariyatti.org.
Ofrecemos libros impresos, libros electrónicos, audiolibros, vídeos, podcasts y otros audios, transcripciones, libros infantiles (incluidos libros de actividades, cuentos y para colorear), accesorios de meditación, tarjetas regalo y mucho más. Muchos recursos se ofrecen de forma gratuita.

Eche un vistazo a todas nuestras ofertas y servicios, incluidos los programas y peregrinaciones Pāli: 
www.pariyatti.org

El contenido de este vídeo está protegido por derechos de autor 2023 Pariyatti.

data.description:
Questo è un audiolibro Pariyatti di "Karma e caos" di Paul R. Fleischman e Forrest D. Fleischman. (https://store.pariyatti.org/karma-e-caos).

0:00 Pariyatti Intro
0:26 La Scienza e il Karma
15:13 Il Caos
40:48 I principi del kamma
55:24 L'assenza di un "Io" permanente
1:42:07 Crediti e Informazioni su Pariyatti

Altri libri di Dr. Paul R. Fleischman: 
https://store.pariyatti.org/paul_fleischman

Sfoglia il nostro intero catalogo di audiolibri:  
https://store.pariyatti.org/audiobooks


Acquista il libro stampato da Ubaldini: http://astrolabio-ubaldini.com/libro/1035.

Sfoglia migliaia di risorse relative alla meditazione Vipassana e agli insegnamenti del Buddha nel nostro negozio online. Stampa libri, eBook, audiolibri, video, podcast e altri audio, trascrizioni, libri per bambini (inclusi libri di attività, storie e da colorare), accessori per la meditazione, buoni regalo e altro ancora. Molte risorse vengono offerte gratuitamente.
https://store.pariyatti.org/

user.name: Pariyatti
user.bio: Pariyatti exists to bring people into contact with the teachings of the Buddha. We provide resources in the Theravāda tradition, and support Pāli language students and Vipassana meditators, in the tradition of Sayagyi U Ba Khin as taught by S.N. Goenka. We serve meditators, scholars, educators and the public by providing ready access to hard-to-find titles, a large collection of online resources, pilgrimages, and Pāli workshops.
user.short_bio: Pariyatti enriches the world by disseminating the words of the Buddha, providing sustenance for the seekers journey, and illuminating the meditators path.

data.name: 4. Sangha at the Crossroads by Bhikkhu Bodhi
data.description:
This is a Pariyatti audiobook of the essay "Sangha at the Crossroads" from the book Facing the Future: Four Essays on the Social Relevance of Buddhism by Bhikkhu Bodhi.

00:00 Pariyatti Introduction
00:26 Sangha at the Crossroads
36:53 Credits and About Pariyatti

Stream/download this audiobook from Pariyatti: 
https://store.pariyatti.org/facing-the-future#audiobook

Download the free eBook:
https://store.pariyatti.org/ebooks

More titles by Bhikkhu Bodhi:
https://store.pariyatti.org/bhikkhu-bodhi

Browse our entire audiobook catalog:  
https://store.pariyatti.org/audiobooks

Browse thousands of resources related to Vipassana meditation and the teachings of the Buddha at our online store. Print books, eBooks, audiobooks, videos, podcasts and other audio, transcripts, children books (including activity, story, and coloring books), meditation accessories, gift cards, and more. Many resources are being offered for free.
https://store.pariyatti.org/

Have a look at all our offerings and services, including Pāli programs and pilgrimages:
